title: Relaxed Coastal Escape to Hawks Nest, NSW
description: Leave city life behind for the coastal beauty of Hawks Nest and Port Stephens, located just a short distance from Sydney, NSW. Enjoy the flexibility of a self-catering escape at Oceanside Hawks Nest, just a stone’s throw from the beach. Your stay includes bike and surfboard hire, a complimentary bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival and late checkout.
offer_address: Booner St & Bennett St, Hawks Nest NSW 2324

title: Family Beachside Getaway on New South Wales’ Coast
description: Head to striking Hawks Nest, perched on the New South Wales’ coast under an hours’ drive from Newcastle, for a beachside getaway and enjoy the flexibility of a self-catering escape at Oceanside Hawks Nest.  Just a stone’s throw from the beach, you can peacefully unwind for two, three or four nights and enjoy a welcome bottle of wine and a box of chocolates on arrival, full-day bicycle or surfboard hire for two, guaranteed late 11am checkout and discounts on the ferry to Nelson Bay.
offer_address: Booner St & Bennett St, Hawks Nest NSW 2324
